name: Dating Sim: The Game
description:
Romance is a theme often found in simulation games, and thanks to the advancement of technology and a brilliant breakthrough, it was now possible for everyone and anyone to find their perfect partner – a mere customization, just like a game. Dating Sim.

Yet, as innocent as it seems, lies unspeakable horrors – horrors that a young woman found herself tangled in.

**Warning: Contains mentions/acts of abuse, gore and blood, and of course twisted romance.

Features:

  • Multiple endings
  • Lots of romance (or not)
  • Blood and gore for the horror lovers
  • A Sci-fi/horror story filled game

-------------------------------------------

Chapter 1 is officially finished! Well, sort of. This was a one-person project that I made back in November 2021 and there's still much work to do. But it's definitely playable so I hope anyone playing this enjoys it! >.<

P.S: Updates will be slow because of classes and my motivation level/procrastination but hopefully Chapter 2 won't take that long :>
